statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ -19 \\ 20 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -11 \\ 6 \\ 12 \\ 7 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
